pr_title: Upgrade parquet libraries version from 1.10.0 to 1.11.0

timeline.message: Upgrade parquet libraries version from 1.10.0 to 1.11.0

timeline.bodyText: Is parquet a transitive dependency of any other libraries in our codebase? i.e. any of the hadoop clients/classes
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText: I took a look here https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.parquet/parquet-avro/usages?p=1 and overall seems fine.
replies.author: bradyoo

replies.bodyText: Can you run mvn dependency:tree and look for the parquet usages?
replies.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText: I took a look and it looks like the only artifact that may conflict is the parquet-hadoop-bundle (v1.8.1) but that dependency is already on a different version anyway. So I think it's ok
replies.author: ZacBlanco
